markdownRemark.html: For organizations with specific IT Operations and Security challenges, Splunk’s new Enterprise Rapid Adoption Packages packages provide the industry’s leading solution to solve challenges with the shortest time to value and most effective deployment cost. Unlike competitors, Splunk Enterprise Rapid Adoption Packages will allow customers to cost-effectively license additional Rapid Adoption Packages to solve a broad set of challenges typically found in smaller or departmental IT and security environments.
